915.text: This work was deemed to be of low mid band credit, about 11 marks.

921.text: The operations included in the production of this item offered some challenge,

926.text: including a zip could be considered challenging,

930.text: but the execution of inserting the zip was poor.

935.text: The diary annotation show some understanding of working properties of materials and manufacturing processes.

943.text: The attention to detail is weak,

945.text: for example the seams don’t match well, there is puckering and folds,

951.text: and some of the construction seems uneven and not symmetrical.

957.text: Students and teachers need to work together to determine the best product for the student to make:

963.text: choosing what will best show their skills, yet still be made well and to a high standard.

970.text: Pursuing a complicated but poorly constructed product may have a more detrimental effect on the overall marks

978.text: that a product that offers less challenge but is made with accuracy and to a high quality.

985.text: For example this final product was deemed poor quality but it functioned adequately in Quality of Outcome

993.text: and was awarded a borderline low/mid band mark.
